verses.verse: O that <S%H4310><s%> <S%H5414><s%> thou wast as my brother, <S%H251><s%> that sucked <S%H3243><s%> the breasts <S%H7699><s%> of my mother! <S%H517><s%> when I should find <S%H4672><s%> thee without, <S%H2351><s%> I would kiss <S%H5401><s%> thee; yea, <S%H1571><s%> I should not <S%H3808><s%> be despised. <S%H936><s%>

I would lead <S%H5090><s%> thee, and bring <S%H935><s%> thee into <S%H413><s%> my mother's <S%H517><s%> house, <S%H1004><s%> who would instruct <S%H3925><s%> me: I would cause thee to drink <S%H8248><s%> of spiced <S%H7544><s%> wine <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3196><s%> of the juice <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6071><s%> of my pomegranate. <S%H7416><s%>
His left hand <S%H8040><s%> should be under <S%H8478><s%> my head, <S%H7218><s%> and his right hand <S%H3225><s%> should embrace <S%H2263><s%> me.

I charge <S%H7650><s%> you, O daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> that <S%H4100><s%> ye stir not up, <S%H5782><s%> nor <S%H4100><s%> awake <S%H5782><s%> <S%H853><s%> my love, <S%H160><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> he please. <S%H7945><s%> <S%H2654><s%>

Who <S%H4310><s%> is this <S%H2063><s%> that cometh up <S%H5927><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> leaning <S%H7514><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> her beloved? <S%H1730><s%> I raised thee up <S%H5782><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the apple tree: <S%H8598><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> thy mother <S%H517><s%> brought thee forth: <S%H2254><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> she brought thee forth <S%H2254><s%> that bore <S%H3205><s%> thee.

Set <S%H7760><s%> me as a seal <S%H2368><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> thine heart, <S%H3820><s%> as a seal <S%H2368><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> thine arm: <S%H2220><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> love <S%H160><s%> is strong <S%H5794><s%> as death; <S%H4194><s%> jealousy <S%H7068><s%> is cruel <S%H7186><s%> as the grave: <S%H7585><s%> the coals <S%H7565><s%> thereof are coals <S%H7565><s%> of fire, <S%H784><s%> which hath a most vehement flame. <S%H7957><s%>

Many <S%H7227><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%> cannot <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3201><s%> <S%H853><s%> quench <S%H3518><s%> love, <S%H160><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> can the floods <S%H5104><s%> drown <S%H7857><s%> it: if <S%H518><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> would give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the substance <S%H1952><s%> of his house <S%H1004><s%> for love, <S%H160><s%> it would utterly be contemned. <S%H936><s%> <S%H936><s%>

We have a little <S%H6996><s%> sister, <S%H269><s%> and she hath no <S%H369><s%> breasts: <S%H7699><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> shall we do <S%H6213><s%> for our sister <S%H269><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> when she shall be spoken for? <S%H7945><s%> <S%H1696><s%>

If <S%H518><s%> she <S%H1931><s%> be a wall, <S%H2346><s%> we will build <S%H1129><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> her a palace <S%H2918><s%> of silver: <S%H3701><s%> and if <S%H518><s%> she <S%H1931><s%> be a door, <S%H1817><s%> we will enclose <S%H6696><s%> <S%H5921><s%> her with boards <S%H3871><s%> of cedar. <S%H730><s%>

I <S%H589><s%> am a wall, <S%H2346><s%> and my breasts <S%H7699><s%> like towers: <S%H4026><s%> then <S%H227><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> I in his eyes <S%H5869><s%> as one that found <S%H4672><s%> favor. <S%H7965><s%>

Solomon <S%H8010><s%> had <S%H1961><s%> a vineyard <S%H3754><s%> at Baal-hamon; <S%H1174><s%> he let out <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> the vineyard <S%H3754><s%> unto keepers; <S%H5201><s%> every one <S%H376><s%> for the fruit <S%H6529><s%> thereof was to bring <S%H935><s%> a thousand <S%H505><s%> pieces of silver. <S%H3701><s%>

My vineyard, <S%H3754><s%> which is mine, <S%H7945><s%> is before <S%H6440><s%> me: thou, O Solomon, <S%H8010><s%> must have a thousand, <S%H505><s%> and those that keep <S%H5201><s%> <S%H853><s%> the fruit <S%H6529><s%> thereof two hundred. <S%H3967><s%>
Thou that dwellest <S%H3427><s%> in the gardens, <S%H1588><s%> the companions <S%H2270><s%> hearken <S%H7181><s%> to thy voice: <S%H6963><s%> cause me to hear <S%H8085><s%> it.

Make haste, <S%H1272><s%> my beloved, <S%H1730><s%> and be thou like <S%H1819><s%> to a roe <S%H6643><s%> or <S%H176><s%> to a young <S%H6082><s%> hart <S%H354><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of spices. <S%H1314><s%>
